text: Capcom...what happened? Duck Tales, Mega Man, listening to fans, essentially the Valve of their day to DLC, spitting on fans, same games full versions a few months later, $60 for 5 hours of gameplay(that isn't even the whole game). This isn't you Capcom. This is Mocpac. I miss you Capcom, arguably the best company ever(back in the day). Please come back to me...to us...we miss you, not this LSD...er..DLC addicted behavior. It can be like old times. It can be like old times. );
